Oração do CS:
Cs nosso que estais na lan,
Santificada seja a vossa AK,
Venha a nós a vossa Colt,
Sejam salvos nossos rounds,
Assim na nuke como na train,
O kevlar nosso de cada dia nos protejei hoje,
Perdoai as nossas bombas não Desarmadas,
Assim como nós perdoamos a quem não a tenha Desarmado,
E não nos deixai ser flashados,
Mas livrai-nos do lag.

Well, I've paid for a game that was only multiplayer only.OK, no stress.
Then the game goes free. OK, whatever, it was the time, waiting 15 minutes for a match was not great.
However, why I should pay again to play parts of the game that I've already paid?
Is this EA Games or what?

I was diagnosed with a rare, terminal cancer and the doctors have given me 8 months. I'm so glad I was able to play this masterpiece before I go. I know many people will probably not see this; but I highly recommend you play this game if you do see it. The pacing, visuals, everything is masterfully crafted. Thank you Valve for giving me this.
